title: Schedule
text: The schedule skeleton below is a rough draft to give the flavor of the agenda, and it will change.

title: Schedule
text:
Friday, January 31, 2025
Friday is an optional half day of content.
1:00p-4:00p Technical Workshop
5:00p-7:00p Women in Soccer Analytics Reception

title: Schedule
text:
Saturday, February 1, 2025
Saturday is the main program, with a full slate of speakers. The lineup will feature a blend of analysts, academics and senior front office decision-makers.
8:45a-9:00a Welcome and Opening Remarks
9:00a-11:00a Speaker Session 1
11:00a-12:00p Speaker Session 2A
1:30p-2:30p Speaker Session 2B
3:00p-5:00p Speaker Session 3
Students will have an opportunity to submit proposals for research projects using proprietary data.

title: Registration
text:
Registration will open in July 2024.
Please take 5 minutes before July 1, 2024, to submit a response to our interest survey.

title: American Soccer Insights Summit
Sponsors
text:
The ASI Summit is partially funded by a grant from the Office of Research at Rice.
We are seeking additional sponsors to keep registration costs accessible and to fund travel for deserving students. If you are interested in becoming a sponsor, please contact us at americansoccersummit@gmail.com.

title: Location
text: The ASI Summit will be held at the Anderson-Clarke Center on the campus of Rice University.
